concept_data.title: United Nations Programme on Human Settlements

summary: The "United Nations Programme on Human Settlements," commonly referred to as "UN-Habitat," is a pivotal entity within the United Nations framework focused on sustainable urban development and human settlements. In the context of EU legal and regulatory documents, UN-Habitat's initiatives align with the EU's objectives of promoting sustainable development, enhancing urban resilience, and ensuring adequate housing for all. The EU collaborates with UN-Habitat to address urban challenges and implement policies that reflect the principles of the European Green Deal. This partnership underscores the EU's commitment to international cooperation in achieving the Sustainable Development Goals, particularly Goal 11 on sustainable cities and communities.
